rubric_description: Evaluates how helpful and useful the assistant's responses are to the user
dimension_description: How well the assistant's responses address the user's questions or needs
score_1: Responses are completely off-topic or irrelevant
score_2: Responses are somewhat related but miss key points
score_3: Responses address the topic but lack depth or miss some aspects
score_4: Responses are relevant and address most aspects of the user's needs
score_5: Responses are highly relevant and comprehensively address all user needs

rubric_description: Evaluates how helpful and useful the assistant's responses are to the user
dimension_description: Whether the assistant provides complete and thorough answers
score_1: Responses are incomplete or leave major questions unanswered
score_2: Responses provide basic information but lack important details
score_3: Responses are reasonably complete but could include more detail
score_4: Responses are thorough and include most necessary information
score_5: Responses are comprehensive and include all relevant details

rubric_description: Evaluates how helpful and useful the assistant's responses are to the user
dimension_description: How well the assistant provides practical actionable advice or information
score_1: Responses provide no actionable guidance or next steps
score_2: Responses mention actions but are vague or impractical
score_3: Responses provide some actionable guidance but could be clearer
score_4: Responses provide clear practical guidance that users can follow
score_5: Responses provide excellent specific actionable guidance with clear steps
